main event: A UFO was sighted in Las Vegas that disappeared and reappeared as two separate objects exhibiting extreme speed and acceleration.
interesting points: The sighting involved one object that changed into two objects,The objects disappeared behind clouds after approximately 1 minute of observation,The objects were noted to have a dark color,The course of the objects was from Northwest to North/Northeast,The probable explanations included balloon, aircraft, or possibly a space vehicle.
sighted object: one dark colored object turning into two
witness description: Director of Research and Development for airlines, and a director of an advertising agency
